message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to purchase it at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and lasts for the next 3 days. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure such an exceptional value.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the introductory price, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know if you're interested in negotiating further.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your interest and feedback, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $13,750 for the product. This is my best offer for now, and I hope it aligns more closely with your expectations.
